snippet: The flow of refugees and migrants on the Arctic route through Russia is tiny, compared with other routes. But it has added anxiety, not to mention intrigue, to a crisis that is tearing the European Union apart.
abstract: Abrupt halt in flow of migrants entering Finland through Russian-controlled Arctic route fuels suspicion that Russia is deliberately opening and closing its roads in effort to undermine European Union while it struggles with migration crisis.
lead_paragraph: The flow of refugees and migrants on the Arctic route through Russia is tiny, compared with other routes. But it has added anxiety, not to mention intrigue, to a crisis that is tearing the European Union apart.

headline.main: E.U. Suspects Russian Agenda in Migrants’ Shifting Arctic Route
headline.print_headline: For Migrants Into Europe, a Road Less Traveled

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
